alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 19 at 2:41PM AKDT until October 20 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with areas of low visibility. Total snow accumulations one to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits, White Mountains, Steese and Elliott Highway summits, and high terrain south of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility to a half mile or less. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest winds gusting to 30 mph are causing blowing snow and low visibility over highway summits. Winds and blowing snow will decrease Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
